articles.description: Gone are the days when imported Bombay and Bengaluru girls always crack the code as the leading ladies on the silver screen, as Telugu girls are proving their mettle more and bigger now. Recently, we have seen how YouTuber Vaishnavi Chaitanya became the talk …

articles.title: Rajinikanth Defends Daughter Over "Sanghi" Remark - NDTV
articles.description: Superstar Rajinikanth on Monday said his daughter Aishwarya did not term 'Sanghi' a 'bad word' and only expressed her point of view that he was a spiritual person.
articles.content:
Rajinikanth said that daughter expressed her point of view that he was a spiritual person. (File)
